title: How evil is Dota 2 at the moment???
body:
http://image2.redbull.com/rbcom/010/2016-12-15/1331834882776_2/0010/1/550/366/2/the-new-journey-has-launched-on-public-servers.jpg

Have been reading the new steam reviews about Dota 2
and so far everyone calls the game **** evil
A league/hots clone or something 

Was wondering if it really is THAT bad?
mehehehehehe
